website_summaries.verdict: A giant assortment of fun, 3D stickers in numerous kid-approved designs. The few durability concerns don't stop youngsters from enjoying this unique collection.
pros: Kids love the puffy structure of these stickers that give them a 3D appearance
Set comes with a wide array of designs that are appealing to youngsters, including animals, smiley faces, numbers, letters, and more
cons: Top, puffy part of the stickers occasionally falls off the adhesive
Some of the stickers are quite small and difficult for small children to handle

customer_reviews.title: Great stickers!!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are awesome! I was worried it was going to be a bunch of repeats but there was a huge variety. Bought them for a craft project for my sons 4th bday party. They look great stuck to crafts, kids, walls, furniture, etc. Totally worth the extra $9 I paid for next day shipping because I'm a procrastinator!! Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: My kids like playing with them
customer_reviews.text: They just don't stick... Kind of torn. My kids like playing with them. Then they peel them of the paper and stick them ask over the house. They are easy to get off again but I'm sick of finding tiny stickers everywhere. A paper with stickers hung on the fridge will see them slowly drop to the floor one by one... Given a choice I would NOT buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: A-DUB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful set! I bought these to use as reward stickers for my daughter. I felt that typical reward stickers were boring and uninspiring. My daughter loves these! She thinks they are adorable and is still excited to use them on her chart after a couple weeks. This set is a great bargain too - a lot of quality stickers for the price and none of the sheets are repeats. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Halloween option
customer_reviews.text: We always have non-candy treats for Halloween because so many kids have allergy issues. Stickers are a big hit with the kids. Even the older ones like selecting their sheets of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbitzmom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stickers that are perfect as gifts!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are high quality and a wonderful gift for kids! They are not too big or too small! I used these as part of the gift that I gave my students in a goody bag at the end of the school year. There are plenty of designs for boys (sports, dinosaurs, cars etc) and plenty of gender neutral designs (smileys, emojis, food, stars , etc) that make this easy to give girts for both boys and girls. Also, the stickers convenientely come on sheets that are inside of a plastic sleeve, which protect the stickers. The sheets would also be easy to cut in half, if you wanted to. Great for goody bags/birthdays!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for girls sticker collections!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are amazing. The latest fad in my daughters' school is trading stickers. I went to Michael's to buy them sheets of stickers (since they are only trading full sheets of 'puffy' stickers.) The cheapest ones I found were $1.49 per sheet. When I found these on Amazon, I knew I won the jackpot!! Each sheet comes in its own plastic sleeve. They are the right type of stickers too - puffy. You can't beat this price anywhere. Now each of my girls have tons of stickers to trade and I'm one happy mom because I didn't have to break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob's mom

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass stickers for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! Great quality and great price. I got the 80 count and it works out to be 20 cents a sheet. I personally like to cut the sheets up into smaller pieces, into 3 or 4 sections. My little one is only two so this helps slow her down from using them all at once. We also use them in our reusable sticker book and it's great. Sometimes the plastic front and sticky back separate when you try to pick them off for reuse, but not enough to make it significant. I got NO REPEATS out of the 80 sheets. Similar themes and styles for some but not the same. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KaelynSchmaylen

customer_reviews.title: These are great and a really good deal if your kids like ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and a really good deal if your kids like stickers. The puffy sticker is as fun as a glitter sticker without the mess of glitter. Win win. The variety of stickers in this pack was funny. Some were cartoon animals, some were realistic foods, like a handful of dried medjool dates. Not sure when my daughter would use them, of whether she would actually know what they are (Or perhaps she'd think it's the realistic precursor to the poop emoji). Random stickers aside, it's still a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 almost 3 year old who loves stickers. He likes to re-stick and I’ve found that the “puffy” stickers are easier for this. These actually have been great. He can put them on paper, take them off and reapply several more times before the adhesive starts to decrease. Lots of fun variety. There is a lot of packaging - each sleeve is individually packaged. Could easily use them as party favors etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy scrapbooking and other crafts, including making cards for children in hospitals. I love these stickers! They arrive in a box that's easy for storage and keeps the stickers organized. The stickers are not only in plastic sleeves, the sleeves are bundled in sets. The stickers are larger than most puffy stickers, vibrant and there are many to choose from. I will only purchase Purple Ladybug now. They can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: HHW

customer_reviews.title: I did like the assortment
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of transportation stickers but no fire engines, police cars or construction vehicles. I wished those were in there. I did like the assortment. The stickers do stick but if you take them off they wont stick anymore. My little kids peeled off the picture and left the sticky part. Just so moms will know. Overall pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value. I was pleasantly surprised in this item
customer_reviews.text: Terrific value. I was pleasantly surprised in this item. I had never heard of this brand and I expected many duplicates. That wasn't the case at all and the kids are SO excited with all the stickers! I went back to get the other package they have available and would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stefoin

customer_reviews.title: So-so Stickers
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how many stickers you get for this price, but the sheets are smaller than I expected (my fault) and when trying to take the sticker off the sheet the picture portion of the puffy sticker often detaches from the sticky half :( Another reason I didnt give these 5 stars is because it isnt true that none of the stickers are duplicates, and majority of the sheets are of the generic hearts, stars, smiley faces, ect.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stickers for kids
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these stickers four times over the past few years. They are perfect. My kids starting at age 1.5 have loved them. Easy for young kids to remove from the sheet. Sticks very easily to everything and most importantly they’re also easy to take off. We’ve had them on random objects around our house for years. They really stay on and they don’t leave any residue whenever I get around to removing them. My kids ask for these stickers everyday. It’s a great activity. They would probably finish the whole box in one day if I let them, even though it’s a really big box.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Creative Choice for Kids
customer_reviews.text: One of my twin two-year-old toddlers fell and broke her leg. As soon as I heard that she would have to be off her feet for at least 4 weeks, and that her mother who has a 5 year old, another 2 year old and is expecting her first son in late June, I decided to help out by buying some craft supplies that would keep everyone busy. When I saw this Mega Pack (80 sheets) of puffy stickers, I knew this would be the top of my list. My daughter and my granddaughters were absolutely THRILLED with the stickers. They were kept intrigued and busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: sel-mi

customer_reviews.title: FML
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I have puffy stickers covering just about every surface in my house. On a positive note they do come off easily without leaving a mess. Kids absolutely love them of course. Attached to handy little plastic sheets/cards so they can be used as 'reward' or 'incentive' to do chores etc.
customer_reviews.author: D.z

customer_reviews.title: I am a substitute teacher and the kids love these stickers
customer_reviews.text: I am a substitute teacher and the kids love these stickers. The only reason I am giving this product 4 stars is that when handing these out, several of the tops of the stickers came apart from the adhesive portion. Mostly these were the emojis - the others seemed to stay together. Good variety of stickers!
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: ... olds as rewards for potty training and they are perfect. The designs are adorable and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preschool class of 2 year olds as rewards for potty training and they are perfect. The designs are adorable and I love the realistic ones as well. The only things I got repeated were themes (insects,food,transportation) however each sheet even in its own category had totally seperate designs. I seperated them in categories and filed them in a small box. They happen to work well with my themes so during a dinosaur week we would use those :).
customer_reviews.author: Tanye

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves the puffy type stickers and uses them ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves the puffy type stickers and uses them for decorating. She was impressed with the wide variety of designs in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these adorable puffy stickers for using with a game I created. 60 plus recipients...ages 12-75 will receive their "game kit" before January 1, 2019. Because they are sticking to felt, I decided to take no chances and I used a dot of hot glue to insure they would stay on the fabric. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Stacy

customer_reviews.title: great stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is a buttload of stickers. Didn't take a moment to digest how many stinkers this would be before buying. Now we have them all over our house and our boys feel entitled to make art projects that entail simply putting random stickers on a piece of paper. A few of the sticker faces delaminated from the puffy back, but not many. Overall great buy. There's many different themes as well, and no duplicate sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Fall Apart
customer_reviews.text: When I went to use these stickers they looked good for a few minutes until they separated and the puffy part fell off. Not just on one sticker, but on just about all of them that I used. Very disappointing to the students. Not money well spent. Won’t be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variety
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and variety. I haven't found any sheets that are doubles. The stickers are easy to remove by little hands and make an excellent fine motor skill activity. The stickers also stick really well to all kinds of paper, as well as pumpkins. They don't damage the table when I peel them off. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Gift Ever For Little Fingers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best children’s gift ever!!!! They are easy for little fingers to get off the paper, are indestructible, and reusable. And SO SO SO MANY GREAT ONES. I gave this to a 3 year old girl for her birthday and had so many moms ask me to send them the link for it. A winner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah in NC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a cost effective way to let your little one blow through stickers. They are a little puffy which makes them easier for little hands to work with. They stick well to paper but come off of furniture and doors quite easily (thankfully!) No duplicate stickers though there are repeated themes (e.g., animals, cars, emojis, cupcakes). Really cute!
customer_reviews.author: pdxreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain for the price
customer_reviews.text: My boys 2 and 4 love stickers. These are unique and some of them are very realistic which we all think is cool. I wish there were multiple sheets of each type if that makes sense. We needed some monkey stickers and there were only 2 total in the entire set. Not worth taking a star off the rating for, but sometimes a kid needs more than 2 monkey stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper M

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my peds rotation and they were a huge hit with the kids. The doctors were amazed at how I was able to calm and make friends with all the kids including the shy ones. They are all a decent size and there’s something for every child in this pack. Well worth the price and money.
customer_reviews.author: Spongebob

customer_reviews.title: Great for many ages and both boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: These sticker sheets are GREAT! I used them to bribe my kids to do extra chores over spring break. I've never seen them so motivated. I was impressed at the variety! my four kids are interested in very different things and there was enough variety to keep them all happy. Great deal on stickers!
customer_reviews.author: chocohug

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun designs. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as an allergy friendly Halloween treat. Lots of designs from cartoons to realistic cars/animals. Great for individually handing out as each has a protective plastic sleeve. My kids loved all the leftovers and have spent hours using them. Stuck extras in my purse in case of a toddler emergency. Only downside is they are not super sticky, but could be an upside depending on where your kid likes to put stickers!
customer_reviews.author: LKP

customer_reviews.title: Great value, truly no repeats
customer_reviews.text: I picked this particular pack because I needed them same day. They did not disappoint! They were a cute addition to valentine cards. There were no repeats. I bought two sets and they were both exactly the same. There are a good mix of realistic photo stickers (of cars and animals) and cartoon-y ones. There are a lot of vehicle stickers which my kids will love!
customer_reviews.author: Anne K

customer_reviews.title: Great prizes, students love them!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for classroom prizes, my students love them and always ask for more. They are VERY smelly and the first day or so it can be a little overwhelming if you have them all together, but it calms down.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Homework for stickers
customer_reviews.text: We’re a home school family. Like all children who school sometimes it’s difficult to encourage a child to do their work. That’s where Ladybug comes in. Like all children ours love stickers. She is rewarded with her choice of stickers and can’t wait to finish her work to get to choose her favorite for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Pitre

customer_reviews.title: They keep her busy for a good 20-30 minutes plus - so
customer_reviews.text: My 22 month daughter discovered stickers recently. They keep her busy for a good 20-30 minutes plus - so, I needed LOTS of stickers. The box has tons of variety that appeals to a range of ages. Whenever we're going somewhere where other kids will be, I grab several sleeves and they're always a hit!
customer_reviews.author: cmrr625

customer_reviews.title: A good variety of small sticker gifts
customer_reviews.text: I am part of several card exchanges and I found that both children and adults enjoy a small surprise in the envelope. These stickers are working fantastic so that I can find a sheet that anyone would find some happiness in. They are good quality and very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A sticker for every occasion
customer_reviews.text: My high school students love stickers. There are so many that these will last me a few years at least. They are fun, stick well, and there is a great variety. I can find a sticker for every occasion. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: JMar

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality stickers
customer_reviews.text: I received the package on time and in good condition. The stickers are small and cute and of good quality. I like the fact that there is not much repetition in the stickers. My daughter loved it. It sticks very well too without leaving any mark.
customer_reviews.author: Shwetha

customer_reviews.title: If these are for paper they're ok if you're buying for your childs hands nope they don't stick!
customer_reviews.text: They will fall right off your childs hands if you are buying for rewards. If they are for putting on paper they are great and there are tons of them. Just so you know ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: ... work with the nursery kiddos at church and we LOVE these stickers in our Sunday school class
customer_reviews.text: I work with the nursery kiddos at church and we LOVE these stickers in our Sunday school class. The kids are 18 months to 3 years old and they absolutely adore these bright stickers. The stickers have great sticking power and are easy for little hands to manipulate. I will keep buying this product as long as I am working with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s second grade teacher asked for stickers to be donated to the class. I just gave her this huge and adorable pack and she was absolutely THRILLED! These are super cute and the variety in this pack is endless! For $13 (I have prime, so free shipping) I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: They could definitely be more puffy but there is SO MUCH variety and they are so cute! My students will be crazy happy with these and I will probably steal a few for myself. I think I am set for years on stickers but I would buy these again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lots of stickers!
customer_reviews.text: got this for my little cousin (who's 5 years old). This pack has so many stickers; it's endless fun and my cousin loved it! (minor warning: the stickers do have a bit of chemical smell right out of the box)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is obsessed with stickers and loves sticking them to everything. The bubbled ones like these allow him to easily get them off the plastic and stick them to things. He loves them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers with speech delays.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them to work with my child that is behind with words. If you can, please change your description to include how much this can help a parent struggling with speech delays.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Laffler

customer_reviews.title: I good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the purchase. I like that the stickers have individual wrapping, as they are given to students at our school. Absolutely loving the variety of themes and you cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: shariar  rahimi

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great Variety of stickers! I used these for goody bags for my son's Easter party. There were different types to please everyone! He had a blast going through them and wanted to keep them all for himself haha
customer_reviews.author: BeattyMom3

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: We use these stickers at a weekly free community market as we care for the shoppers children. We have children of all ages who enjoy these sticker. We would like to have more smiley faces in the stickers. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variety
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!!! Great variety of stickers for everyone. Used them as a non-food treat for Halloween and even the teenagers were grabbing these instead of candy!
customer_reviews.author: Dorianne Colon

customer_reviews.title: A winner 😊
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. The stickers are so varied. My 3 yr old granddaughter will be given a diary for Christmas so the stickers will be great. For now, she has placed on some books and on window. I highly recommed this product. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Heythaler

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Appreciation Gift - Check!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Smokes! There's a lot of stickers that come in this pack! And they look impressive, too. We used them for our teacher appreciation week teacher supply table. They're on the small size, but the puffy factor and clear plastic backing making them look really nice! The other stickers looked drab in comparison. The variety was super good, too. Great for any gender!
customer_reviews.author: A. Vasey

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in heaven! I on the other hand am not...I have stickers everywhere in my house! These stickers are of very high quality and would appeal to a child of any taste as the subject manners are very diverse. trucks, cars, animals, cartoons, and flowers, almost too many options.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stickers and Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Kindergarten party to decorate some plastic pails and the kids absolutely loved them! There's an amazing variety of stickers throughout this set and we had plenty to cover a class of 16 with several sheets left over.
customer_reviews.author: Wojo

customer_reviews.title: The stickers aren't the best quality and split apart (the artwork comes off of ...
customer_reviews.text: The stickers aren't the best quality and split apart (the artwork comes off of the sticky backing), but considering how much you get for the price, they are still absolutely worth it. My son has a blast with these and I don't feel bad tossing them out afterwards because there's plenty more. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Puki311

customer_reviews.title: Nice stickers and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister who is a kindergarten teacher. Great product for the price value. The stickers are good quality. And I like the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: the four stacks of stickers were nice gifts for elementary teachers to give out a sheet ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheets of stickers are smaller than I had anticipated. Maybe 3 inches by 6 inches. However, the four stacks of stickers were nice gifts for elementary teachers to give out a sheet of stickers as part of their stash of prizes for students.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety and quantity
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety and quantity. Good for our project of sticking on picture frames. If you're looking to give every kid a sheet though, you may have a slightly harder time finding ones that appeal to boys. At a glance, many appear more girly in coloration. And I don't think I saw a single one with sports (though it's possible they got used before I got a hold of them).
customer_reviews.author: Smarsh

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Easy and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2 year old daughter loves these stickers. She is able to peel them off herself which she had a harder time doing with paper stickers. These 3D stickers also cone off of any surface she has put them on and have left no residue. There is a ton of variety, and they are a great deal for the price! It's much more if you try to get stickers like these from Michael's. We will buy more once she gets through all of this bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are not 8 x 10.
customer_reviews.text: Many, many stickers. Good product. I was surprised that the sheets were not 8 x 10 like I thought (advertised 80 sheets) but was happily surprised with the quality and variety.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gresh

customer_reviews.title: Don't like design
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality are really average, there are not many favorite patterns, there are many repeated patterns, and I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is a sticker fanatic. I've purchased A LOT of stickers from Amazon and they usually are way too big and once applied are a pain to remove. These are small, colorful, come off with ease and leaves no residue, and so cute I took some of his stickers and sticker bombed the back of my phone!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: They’re great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Tons of stickers. My 2 year old nieces love them. Every so often I bring them out and they can choose a couple sheets. Will last me a long time! Some people complain they aren’t sticky enough. I think they’re just sticky enough. They’ll stick to whatever paper they’re playing with but if they end up in the counter or chairs, no biggie!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G.

customer_reviews.title: Great stickers but...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaints are that they dont stick well and i was really hoping the stickers would be bigger for toddler hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amour

customer_reviews.title: For the most part the stickers are pretty girly ans a lot are tiny
customer_reviews.text: For the most part the stickers are pretty girly ans a lot are tiny. However, my sons are really excited about the dinosaurs and vehicle ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mom_2_7_dudes

customer_reviews.title: Great Assortment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these expecting there to be a lot of repeated stickers because the picture doesn't show too many different designs. I am pleasantly surprised to discover I only have 2 of the 80 sheets that are repeats. It's great! There are so many different sheets and designs. Great for kids. Or Scrapbooking as I will use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Tons of stickers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a ton of puffy stickers with various designs. They are on a large number of separate backing sheets, which allowed us to use them as part of party favor bags, with lots left to give as small gifts to our daughter. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: I work at a school and especially love puffy stickers. This pack comes with a lot of variety and are very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a kids dream
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, I wanted to spend my money on candy and stickers. These would have been the stickers I would have spent my money on. Now that I have kids, I enjoy seeing their faces light up and their brains get creative when using these stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible the stickers fall right off the sticky part useless
customer_reviews.author: Jessi45

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pack of stickers, bought them for my 2 and a half year old and she loves them. Puffy stickers are her favorite (much easier for her little hands to get off the paper), and the variety and quality is excellent. Considering before i had only been able to find sticker packs in stores that had one sheet of puffys each this was a great find for the price. I highly recommend and will be purchasing again once she gets through all of these.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome variety of stickers
customer_reviews.text: I used these for goodie bags. The selection was awesome! I see more of these sticker purchases in my future!
customer_reviews.author: Eenchoo

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: Great collection of stickers. Used these for goodie bags, was a good variety and they stick well.
customer_reviews.author: CMHageman

customer_reviews.title: A toddler hit!
customer_reviews.text: There is a nice variety in this pack. My 2-year old can get them off the page herself, which she loves. I do have stickers all over the house, but they eventually stick to clothes and come off in the dryer :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: Need a mom break?  Buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and a crowd pleaser for sure. Super easy to peel off. My 1.5 y o even can do it and loves these. The kids also love the very crinkly plastic sheets the stickers come on. Seriously buy these. And get yourself some free time.
customer_reviews.author: ashley janezic

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves stickers and he is still moving his way through these. They are very small. Each sticker is about the size of my pinky nail, tho some are a little bigger. Overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Kent

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE! VERY PLEASED. :-)
customer_reviews.text: Even though this sticker set cost over $18, there are so many stickers; and each one is different. High quality, fun, puffy stickers! Really GREAT for teachers, birthdays, etc. THANKS! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Do not stick to anything
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old is super into stickers and got so excited to use these however they DO NOT stick to ANYTHING. After the first use I had loose stickers all over the house as they fell off the paper she carried around so proud of. She loves them so much that we will keep them but we have to use glue in order to keep them adhered to paper or other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Lots of the stickers are a bit silly and repeated. But some are cute and they stick pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stickers. Really cute designs! They’re going in party bags for my son and daughter. Nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Onpointeventbartending

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are great! I love the puff stickers for toddlers because they’re easier for their little fingers to grab and if they put them somewhere other than the paper, they’re easy for me to get off! Seriously, this is hours of fun/entertainment for any toddler!
customer_reviews.author: OutsideInMT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collection of stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great collection of stickers for an amazing value!!! So many designs for both boys and girls! Great for crafting and reward stickers
customer_reviews.author: jellysun

customer_reviews.title: Quality was not good. My 21 months old tried to peel it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I saw this on Amazon. Quality was not good. My 21 months old tried to peel it off, the top part came right off and left the sticky part still on the paper. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon704

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. I take a sleeve of stickers to church or my sons sports games so my 2 year old has something to do. She absolutely loves stickers and there are so many. I plan on buying another one and a sticker book for a friend's birthday coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZING collection of interesting stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING collection of interesting stickers, with soooooo many designs! The best part? They come off of the things your child sticks them on around the house easily! I have bought these for a bunch of friends as well because they are that super.
customer_reviews.author: Clyderiver77

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sticker set!
customer_reviews.text: My son's girlfriend is crazy about stickers, and she is very particular about them. We ordered these for her, and she went wild over them. She loved that there are so many different specific objects as the themes for the stickers, and she can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Ross

customer_reviews.title: best stickers ever!
customer_reviews.text: i am 78 years old ,and these are the best stickers i ever purchased !!
customer_reviews.author: selma rowell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great variety, good quality, can't beat the price. I'll definitely be buying this again and looking at what other products the company sells. All in all a great transaction, arrived quickly, great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are a great value for the price. Awesome selection. My only complaint is that they do not stick well to clothes so I am finding stickers everywhere in and outside the house!
customer_reviews.author: katie wicklander

customer_reviews.title: I love how much of a variety of stickers there are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how much of a variety of stickers there are within this packet. Although some of the sheets share the same theme each sticker is different and there are none that are exactly the same. The stickers are very pretty, vibrant, colorful and just plain cool. Cool enough to get any kid excitied about school. I highly reccommend. I even gave a few sheets to my mom who is a teacher and she loves them just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Talya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughters love them. They stick great, but are still removable.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: excellent mix. Each sheet is individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, packaged well, excellent mix. Each sheet is individually wrapped, so nothing gets pulled loose or stuck to something else. Most are appropriate for either boys or girls, while some will probably appeal to one more than the other.
customer_reviews.author: ade

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Sticker Set EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best set of stickers out there, hands down. The material they use does not adhere to things you do want it to. Like clothes and walls and floors, etc. And there are SO MANY different themed sleeves! Theres definitively something for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these. The younger one enjoys sticking it on Windows and nose and the older one is saving them to trade with friends. They are puffy but not very puffy if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Super mom

customer_reviews.title: Tons of stickers. Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten such great use out of these things. I'm about to reorder. Lots of variety, cute options, and really keep my kids entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Greenss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stickers were awesome! This is a terrific deal for all the high quality cute stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Tesam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, I love them!
customer_reviews.text: So useful to have this pack at home to add to bday cards and give to nephews when they want to play with something!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, the kids at the hospital love them & always want more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on these. The colored puffy part of the stickers falls off extremely easily. I had a school full of disappointed kids.
customer_reviews.author: Caralay M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal and great quality. I used these as rewards for my toddler for potty training and had her stick them on her potty chart. They were perfect because it was a huge variety and I could always find a set she really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel James Staats

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stickers.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with stickers and this package is giving her hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Page

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variety
customer_reviews.text: The stickers themselves are pretty small but they are so adorable. We gave them out as part of a take-home bag for a birthday party. I would buy them again if I were to run out (which won't be anytime soon since we got so many!)
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sticker Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sticker pack. I gave them to my nephew today as a birthday present and we spent over 30 minutes looking through them because he was so excited and wanted to see them all. He loved them! So cute, and not a lot of "filler" stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

product_meta.title: Purple Ladybug 3D Puffy Stickers for Kids & Toddlers Mega Variety Pack - 80 Different Sticker Sheets with Over 1900 Cute Stickers in Bulk! Includes Stars, Animals, Alphabet, Cars, Emoji Faces, More!
feature_bullets: NEAR ENDLESS STICKERS WILL KEEP KIDS BUSY: Each box has 80 unique sheets totaling about 2000 3D puffy stickers - makes for hours of creative activity fun!
INCREDIBLE BULK VALUE FOR PARENTS OR TEACHERS, NO REPEATED SHEETS: 80 different sheets (6.75 inches x 2.75 inches each) with approximately 25 stickers per sheet; each sheet in an individual sleeve

YOUR SATISFACTION, GUARANTEED: Please Beware of fakes, the Purple Ladybug logo on the puffy sticker sleeve, our logo on each sheet and our bright yellow box is your guarantee of Purple Ladybug Novelty quality; If you're not completely satisfied with anything you get from us, contact us and we'll make it right, guaranteed!
YOU GET WHAT YOU SEE IN THE PHOTOS: Don't worry about seeing a sheet you love in the photos and not getting it in your pack, with our 80 sheet pack, what you see is what you get!

THE POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS: Perfect for use as teacher stickers artwork creative play gifts crafting collecting decorating wrapping motivating rewarding scrapbooking goodie bag stuffers loot bag fillers & memory books & teachers supplies!
